title: Transuranium elements
creator_credit: Hal Geer, David W. Ridgway and Davidson Films
brief_description: Reviews the historical problem of the placement of the transuranium elements in the periodic table. The properties of the new elements are demonstrated, and the Hilac, an instrument used in making elements of very high atomic number, is shown. The transuranium elements so far discovered re neptunium, plutonium, americium, curium, berkelium, californium, and einsteinium
